I swear I did not bend over and rip them because they were too small. I used a gentle laundry detergent on cold water to wash. And I did not have and gastrointestinal issues that causes me to release toxic gasses that would degrade the integrity of the material. Definitely not money well spent. I am sad.  Loved these so much i bough in other colors in same size. COULDNT fit the other ones on. THe black and white pants are great. comfortable. cozy, and can still wear to work. The fabric is pilling quickly though--owned for about 2 months and wore about 4 times.

These are not jeans nor are they a soft fabric by any means. They are a loosely woven fabric - on the rougher side. They pill after first wear and the weave comes apart as it is not good quality fabric. Save your money - the only nice thing is that they look great in the advertisement picture and they are true to size - but poor quality. Not sure why they are called jeans!
Promptly shipped to and higly praised by a teen (You KNOW it's good when a teen favorably reviews)
They are worth it, and the sizing is perfect.
I absolutely love them thank you.
My daughter loves these pants. They fit her perfectly.

I've been on the hunt for a decent pair of casual black and white plaid pants forever, and these didn't even last a single wash. When first receiving them, the pants already had a few pieces of balled up fabric and the material was incredibly flimsy and uncomfortable which should've been an indicator for me to return them, but I ended up keeping them.  Within a few washes [on gentle], these pants are completely unwearable as the already uncomfortable fabric is now just nothing but bits of excess fabric balls all over the pants that are incredibly itchy. As much as I wished and tried to maintain them, they weren't high quality to begin with and they didn't even last me a couple of months. Avoid buying these and instead invest in higher quality pants as these will not last.

They must have put these on the world's shortest model, because on my long legged (not super long, just normal long) daughter they look like  capris. They have no stretch to speak of outside the elastic waistband, but are cut in a baggy style so that's not necessary. They have a drawstring that stays in place pretty well, but sadly they've started to pill a bit after only a couple washes. Very much fast fashion.

These pants are described as “jeans”, but they are pajama/lounge pants. They’re as thin as flannel pants but have more of a linen feel. I’m 5’6” and 140 lbs. I ordered a medium and they fit perfectly, but I would have liked them a little baggier so I should have ordered a size up. I was expecting them to have wider legs, however, they are narrower than the product pictures. The waist is also narrow but it has plenty of stretch. They are comfortable and feel nice. A great pair of pants to spend the day lounging in.

Run kind of small, but they're definitely short. I'm 5'4" and they don't reach the ground, they're like highwaters on me. Nice material and style otherwise, but they're not made for normal adult proportions.
Initially I was worried because of how tiny the waist looks but it is actually very stretchy and pretty comfortable once they're on. The material is pretty thin so they feel more like pajamas
The waist band looked small, but it stretches a bunch and fits comfortably. Perfect length, and quality material.

I'm approximately 5.3 feet tall, weighing 125 pounds, and I usually wear medium-sized pants. This pair of pants fits me perfectly and feels incredibly comfortable when I put them on. Considering its price, it's definitely worth every penny. I really love them, and they also go well with a variety of outfits.
These are da bomb!  Fit is great and so comfy.....very happy that I added these to my wardrobe!  You will be too!
Cute print. Well made, good quality. Comfortable. Fits great in the waist, very baggy which they are made that way. Worth the cost!

评论概述: Size up if you want them baggy.
评论详情: These were ordered for a family member, who says: "I usually order size small. However I sized up so they would be a bit longer and baggy. Glad I did because the waist is very small and they likely would have been uncomfortable."

I got this for my wife and she likes it a lot. She said it's very comfortable to wear, thin but not very thin, breathable and cool - perfect for the coming summer. She likes wearing it even when she sleeps. It's light weight and stretchable. It does not look like a pajama so she likes wearing it outside as well, stylish and comfortable. neutral style and color means she can pair it with any top.

评论概述: Cute, Lightweight, Great Pajama Pants or Summer, Casual, Beach Wear
评论详情: These pants are airy, attractive, roomy and feel like pajama bottoms. The tie string waist is cute. You could wear them for sleeping or casually in warm weather when going out with friends or on the beach. They are too thin for cold weather, but flattering and comfortable.

评论概述: Listing title is misleading. They're thin PJ type pants.
评论详情: The title says jeans. These are so not jeans. It also says y2k Gothic grunge. They're just black/white plaid pajama pants basically. They're not flannel or warm tho. They're a thinner, light material, better for summer-type PJ pants but still PJ pants nonetheless. I would recommend sizing up if you want them to be baggy/comfortable or styled at all like the model. Overall not bad pants just the listing title makes no sense really and should be edited.

评论概述: Reminds me of my youth lol
评论详情: Just like the ones I had back in 1993, but with pockets. Looks great with my apple green Doc's.
Cute pants that do not wrinkle easily but the material is a bit rough to the touch.

Baggy pants never look good on me but these do!! They’re definitely not child size or PJ pants like others have said. They’re not even close to feeling like a PJ and I’m petite and fit into children’s clothing, I ordered an adult small, the equivalent to a children’s 14/16, aka XL in kids.  This is adult sizing and they’re good pants. I never see flannel pants as strictly PJ pants , I have other flannel pants and never got told I look like I’m wearing my PJs. These are good pants !! They’re not the softest but they have a good material and not too thick or thin. The string is a nice touch and the waistband is stretchy. I’m 5ft 3 and they’re ever so slightly long but if you wear with boots or a thicker sole for shoes they’ll be just fine. These are a good aesthetic pant and I highly reccomend them!!
I received the black & white pants. I love the fit & feel of these pants. They were a little stiff at first, but softened up nicely after washing. Well-made, good fit.

These are cute, but my daughter isn’t crazy about the fit. She feels the material is a little scratchy (but no so bad she won’t wear them, but they are not comfy soft). Overall , she like them for sleep pants, but they aren’t her favorite pair.
These pants are really stylish looking and soft and they stretch. I like the goth grunge look and how they are really comfortable. It's definitely 90's style. I love them.

These pants are super comfy! I like the colors and the fit. They feel really nice in my skin. They aren’t jeans at all they are more like pajama pants feel.
